Bjarne Andersen wrote:

> It seems like the DomainSensitiveFrontier (which extends BdBFrontier) is
> broken when 'uri-included-structure' was put into BdBFrontier ??
>
> I can't get it running at all - I get a crawl configuration alert !

Fixed in HEAD ([ 1226365 ] DomainSensitiveFrontier broken by 
uri-included-structure).
Thanks for reporting.
St.Ack
